name: Lineye.pl plugin
author: Michal Pietrasik

sections.description: Plugin allows you to put Lineye Widget in a simple way via the administration panel on wordpress site. LinEye is a free website promotion system. Increase traffic to your own website based on the principle: I advertise other, they advertise to me. It’s free and without any fees. (more details on http://www.lineye.pl)
sections.installation:
1. Upload lineye-plugin.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place Lineye widget on Your site through the ‘Apperance->Widgets’ menu in WordPress
  4. Configure Lineye plugin. Set up Your widget ID (You can get it from Lineye widget code avaliable on your Lineye account site)
  5. Click “Save” button
  6. Configure Lineye widget apperance through Your account on Lineye site.

short_description: This plugin makes it easy to display Lineye widget on the wordpress portal.
description: Plugin allows you to put Lineye Widget in a simple way via the administration panel on wordpress site. LinEye is a free website promotion system.
